cgcloud__Visit_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Visit_Template__c
cgcloud__Visit_Template__c.description: Template that describes the basic call behavior.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Add_Job_Policy__c.description: Indicates whether tasks and survey questions can be manually added to visits.

cgcloud__Auto_Status__c.description: Visit status set when call will be planned automatically.

cgcloud__Capture_Proceeding_Time__c.description: Captures the start and end time of a visit.

cgcloud__Check_Overlap__c.description: Indicates whether to check for overlaps while creating calls. If this option is selected, the system checks if a current visit overlaps with any other visits. Only visits in Planned state are considered.

cgcloud__Cmpl_Vst_Geolc_Validation__c.description: Specifies the validation type when a user completes a visit, based on the comparison between their GPS location and the geolocation of the store.

cgcloud__Consider_POS_Check__c.description: If its value is true, then the Call considers POS in its questions.

cgcloud__Delete_Allowed__c.description: Indicates whether a visit can be deleted using a mobile device.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Reference to the description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Display_Promotions__c.description: Indicates whether valid promotions for the customer selected for a visit creation are shown in the Promotions tab of the Visit Detail page.

cgcloud__Does_Show_Read_Only_Visit_Info_.description: Determines whether the users sees an information message that indicates that the visit hasn’t started and is in read-only mode.

cgcloud__Historical_Products__c.description: Determines whether and how historical products are considered when determining the list of products to be surveyed in a visit.

cgcloud__Is_Start_Visit_Rqr_To_Check_In_.description: Determines whether a user needs to start a visit before visit execution.

cgcloud__KPI_Relevant__c.description: Defines whether a call is relevant for KPI calculation for the selected KPIs.

cgcloud__Limit_To_One_Visit_In_Progress_.description: Prevent users from executing multiple visits at the same time.

cgcloud_Location_Capture_at_Start__C.description: Indicates if a user’s GPS location is captured at the start of a visit. This field applies only to Direct Store Delivery and Van Sales processes.

cgcloud__Loc_Capture_During_Cancel__c.description: Indicates if the GPS location of the user is captured at visit cancellation.

cgcloud__Loc_Capture_During_Complete__c.description: Indicates whether the GPS location of the user is captured at visit completion.

cgcloud__Meta_Type__c.description: Defines another level of abstraction - categorizes templates into template templates. For example, is it a template for a Call, a Delivery Visit, a Van Sales, a Merchandising, a Service, or a Phone.

cgcloud__Mobility_Color__c.description: Field that defines the color of call on a mobility device.

cgcloud__Mobility_Relevant__c.description: Indicates whether a visit created can be executed using mobile devices.

cgcloud__Mobility_User_Guidance__c.description: Process navigation (user guidance) that is used on mobility devices.

cgcloud__Promotion_Finding_Lead_Time__c.description: Number of days that specifies future time range for finding of planned promotions.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Defines the Sales Organization in which the template can be used.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: On Selection of visit template (For example, when creating a new visit): Defines the order of the templates.

cgcloud__Start_Vst_Geolc_Validation__c.description: Specifies the validation type when a user starts a visit, based on the comparison between their GPS location and the geolocation of the store.

cgcloud__Sync_Options__c.description: Defines when a visit based on this template will be synced automatically:

cgcloud__Tag_Media_Date_Time__c.description: Indicates whether date and time of media captured during visit execution on mobile devices is stored.

cgcloud__Tag_Media_Geo_Location__c.description: Indicates whether GPS coordinates of media captured during visit execution on mobile devices is stored.

cgcloud__Update_Planned_Times__c.description: Indicates if the Start or End datetimes and duration of the visit should be set

cgcloud__User_Roles__c.description: User roles that are assigned to the Order Template. Note: Ensure that the master picklist values exactly match the technical name of the permission sets. Select the user value in translation. For example, if CGCloud_Master_Data_Admin is the master picklist value, then Master Data Admin is the translated value.
